title: Fix ntfy notification truncation - wrap long messages
description: Notifications sent via ntfy are being truncated instead of wrapping to the next line. Long story titles or messages get cut off, making them hard to read.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Find notification sending code (curl to ntfy.sh)
Check ntfy API docs for message formatting options
Option 1: Use ntfy markdown format for better wrapping
Option 2: Split long messages into title + body
Option 3: Truncate with ellipsis at word boundary, not mid-word
Test: Send a notification with long story title, verify readable

blockedReason: React Ink rewrite will handle notification display properly
